Subskills.name: Potent Exhaling
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by crematus.

Subskills.name: Spiraling Cremation
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple swirling flames around you dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Corrosive Burning
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Corrosive Embers
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict poison break on hit.

Subskills.name: Trifurcate Blow
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash two additional trails of crematus dealing a portion of the damage.

Subskills.name: Toxic Dragonflight
Subskills.description: Gain increased movement speed when casting crematus.

Subskills.name: Toxiamplified Alveoli
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of crematus.

Subskills.name: Toxin Container
Subskills.description: Throw a plague container at target location unleashing crematus into all directions for a short duration. The plague container eventually explodes dealing area of effect damage and stunning nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Tachypnea
Subskills.description: Decreases movement diminish when using crematus.

Subskills.name: Engulfing Pyre
Subskills.description: Chance to burst the ground on flames at burning targets location on hit dealing a portion of the damage over time.

Subskills.name: Bursting Pustules
Subskills.description: Damaging a monster with crematus inflicts a stack of pustules. At full stacks unleash a burst of poison dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Farflames
Subskills.description: Increases the projectile speed, size and damage dealt by crematus.

Subskills.name: Unstable Contamination
Subskills.description: Activate/Deactivate to leave behind a trail of poisonous gas dealing damage over time and slowing targets. Drains mana constantly.
